cline_mcp_settings.json:
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "sequentialThinking": {
      "command": "cmd",
      "args": [
        "/c",
        "npx",
        "-y",
        "@modelcontextprotocol/server-sequential-thinking"
      ],
      "type": "stdio",
      "autoStart": true,
      "restartOnFail": true,
      "timeout": 10000
    },
    "tavily": {
      "command": "cmd",
      "args": [
        "/c",
        "npx",
        "-y",
        "tavily-mcp@0.1.4"
      ],
      "env": {
        "TAVILY_API_KEY": "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"
      },
      "type": "stdio",
      "autoStart": true,
      "restartOnFail": true,
      "timeout": 10000
    },
    "browserTools": {
      "command": "cmd",
      "args": [
        "/c",
        "npx",
        "-y",
        "@agentdeskai/browser-tools-mcp@latest"
      ],
      "env": {
        "BROWSERTOOLS_HOST": "http://localhost:3025"
      },
      "type": "stdio",
      "autoStart": true,
      "restartOnFail": true,
      "timeout": 10000,
      "autoApprove": [
        "getConsoleLogs",
        "getConsoleErrors",
        "getNetworkErrors",
        "getNetworkLogs",
        "takeScreenshot",
        "getSelectedElement",
        "wipeLogs",
        "runAccessibilityAudit",
        "runPerformanceAudit",
        "runSEOAudit",
        "runNextJSAudit",
        "runDebuggerMode",
        "runAuditMode",
        "runBestPracticesAudit"
      ]
    },
    "github.com/modelcontextprotocol/servers/tree/main/src/filesystem": {
      "command": "cmd",
      "args": [
        "/c",
        "npx",
        "-y",
        "@modelcontextprotocol/server-filesystem",
        "c:/Users/YMXD/Desktop/linkO/linkel/Mcp"
      ],
      "type": "stdio",
      "autoStart": true,
      "restartOnFail": true,
      "timeout": 10000
    },
      "fetcher": {
        "command": "cmd",
        "args": [
          "/c",
          "npx",
          "-y",
          "fetcher-mcp"
        ]      
      },
    "bingcnmcp": {
        "command": "cmd",
        "args": [
          "/c",
          "npx",
          "bing-cn-mcp"
      ]
    }
  }
}
